question: How can I support The Coding Train?

answer.text:
Just watching a video or visiting this website is support for the Coding Train! Thank you for being here!
 Financial support of the Coding Train goes towards hardware and software costs as well as production services (design, video editing, website maintenance, social media) for The Coding Train. Available platforms are YouTube Membership, Patreon, Twitch Subscriptions, and GitHub sponsorship.
 You can also support The Coding Train by recommending it to your friends and colleagues, please share on social media and tag @thecodingtrain (Twitter) @the.coding.train (Instagram).
